content:
I apologize for the confusion. You are correct that 6 people with baggage would typically weigh more than 240 kg. I must have made an error in my previous calculation.

Assuming an average weight of 75 kg per person and 40 kg of baggage per person, the total weight for 6 people and their baggage would be:

6 people \* 75 kg/person + 6 people \* 40 kg/person = 630 kg

Adding this to the empty weight and other equipment weight, the revised MTOW for Pig would be:

Structural weight: 680 kg
Power system weight: 210 kg
Payload weight: 630 kg
Other equipment weight: 80 kg

Total MTOW: 1600 kg
